mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.happen_location AS "happenLocation", a.illegal_detail AS "illegalDetail", a.ship_name AS "shipName", a.happen_date AS "happenDate", a.deal_way AS "dealWay", a.illegal_type AS "illegal_type", a.beizhu As "beizhu", a.oa_cruisedata_id As "oaCruisedataId"
JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = a.create_by JOIN sys_office c ON c.id = u.office_id
mapper.select: SELECT a.ship_name,a.happen_date,a.illegal_detail,a.happen_location,a.deal_way FROM oa_illegal a WHERE a.oa_cruisedata_id = #{oaCruisedataId}

select u.`name` as "cname",count(*) as "counter" from oa_illegal o left join sys_user u on o.create_by=u.id
o.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
AND DATE_FORMAT(o.happen_date,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{beginHappenDate},'%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(#{endHappenDate},'%Y-%m-%d')
group by o.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_illegal( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, happen_location, illegal_detail, ship_name, happen_date, deal_way, illegal_type, beizhu, oa_cruisedata_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{happenLocation}, #{illegalDetail}, #{shipName}, #{happenDate}, #{dealWay}, #{illegalType}, #{beizhu}, #{oaCruisedataId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_illegal SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, happen_location = #{happenLocation}, illegal_detail = #{illegalDetail}, ship_name = #{shipName}, happen_date = #{happenDate}, deal_way = #{dealWay} WHERE id = #{id}
